item.title: [Galkon's refactored] Client UPDATED! Re-Release! Dont ask why
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

Hello, Ive edited Galkons Refactored Client.
This is my first time at Refactored client so please dont Flame.

But this is a great client for A new start in rsps:)

Featured:
474 Prayer Tab (Cleaned one)
562 Notes tab
503 Clan Chat (with editing)
508 Option tab (Server Side Below this post)
474 Emotes tab(Works on all servers without editing somethig:)
added hovering Worldmap, Run Tab, And pray tab
Added 562 Gameframe:)
Added 562 hover gameframe
and sideicons ect:P
added friends/ignogre tab with hovering
Added very much models Not custom ones like bronze g or lemon stuff xD
Just like Statius vesta zuriel corrupted dragon
Client is 16MB in rar and 22mb in normal file
added new hp bar
and a new right click with hovering (Freaky easy xD)
Added new hitmarks with tom’s cache suite
Fixed up the compiler.
I didnt change name or something its just galkons refactored.
Has clan editing tab
FLashing CHat icon
added Links opening via chatbox
And for more Just Download it.

Pictures:
Galkons Pics:






My Pictures:

Helpfull users:
Galkon(Josh)
Karnage
Johnny(me)
Lucas
Swat
Stewie
Canownueasy

Downloads:
(1.13 MB)Client Without Cache: http://www.mediafire.com/?mydfn1ynznu
(14.71 MB)Cache: http://www.mediafire.com/?kkxuo4oewjx
(15.8 MB)Client With cache: http://www.mediafire.com/?fmdmdgmyhmj

I Tested this on Devo 2.7/Delta and czar Works Perfectly.
But my server base is Devo 2.7

(SERVER SIDE)
OPTION TAB:
add this in clickingmost.java

case 3138: c.brightnessLevel = 0; c.checkBrightness(); break; 
        case 3140:
            c.brightnessLevel = 1;
            c.checkBrightness();
            break;

        case 3142:
            c.brightnessLevel = 2;
            c.checkBrightness();
            break;

        case 3144:
            c.brightnessLevel = 3;
            c.checkBrightness();
            break;

        case 3145:
            if(c.mouseButtons == 0) {
                c.mouseButtons = 1;
            } else {
                c.mouseButtons = 0;
            }
            c.checkMouseButtons();
            break;

        case 3147:
            if(c.chatEffects == 0) {
                c.chatEffects = 1;
            } else {
                c.chatEffects = 0;
            }
            c.checkChatEffects();
            break;

        case 3189:
            if(c.splitPrivateChat == 0) {
                c.splitPrivateChat = 1;
            } else {
                c.splitPrivateChat = 0;
            }
            c.checkSplitChat();
            break;

        case 48176:
            if(c.acceptAid == 0) {
                c.acceptAid = 1;
            } else {
                c.acceptAid = 0;
            }
            c.checkAcceptAid();
            break;</blockquote>

In client.java declare this:

public int mouseButtons, splitPrivateChat, chatEffects, acceptAid = 0; public int brightnessLevel = 1; public void checkBrightness() { if(brightnessLevel == 0) { setClientConfig(166, 1); } else if(brightnessLevel == 1) { setClientConfig(166, 2); } else if(brightnessLevel == 2) { setClientConfig(166, 3); } else if(brightnessLevel == 3) { setClientConfig(166, 4); } } public void checkMouseButtons() { if(mouseButtons == 0) setClientConfig(170, 0); else setClientConfig(170, 1); } public void checkSplitChat() { if(splitPrivateChat == 0) setClientConfig(287, 0); else setClientConfig(287, 1); } public void checkChatEffects() { if(chatEffects == 0) setClientConfig(171, 0); else setClientConfig(171, 1); } public void checkAcceptAid() { if(acceptAid == 0) setClientConfig(427, 0); else setClientConfig(427, 1); } public void checkOptionsTab() { checkBrightness(); checkMouseButtons(); checkSplitChat(); checkChatEffects(); checkAcceptAid(); }

EMOTES TAB:

No edits needed

NOTES TAB:

Is not done yet you need to figure it out :P

CLICKABLE TEST IN CHATBOX:
Search for you login text like welcome to runescape
Under it paste:

sendMsg("www.google.com#url#"); //DIDNT TEST THIS.

(@!DONE!@)

Oh yeh almoost forgot if you want to have all tabs work search in client.java for Setsidebarinterface(12
Add this under the last setsidebarinterface

setSidebarInterface(14, 17000);//achievement tab setSidebarInterface(15, 17100);//Notes Tab setSidebarInterface(16, 18128);//Clan tab

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2010, 02:59:07 am[/size][hr]Im now making that pic links better.

Read full topic
